head.supplied: SCHEDULE of TRANSFERS submitted by the CHIEF SECRETARY to the GOVERNOR IN COUNCIL ¶ on the ¶ 12th ¶ of ¶ June ¶ 18 ¶ 83. ¶ (sd) Graham Berry ¶ ¶ Chief Secretary....

div.p: Y83/5797, unit 1409, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

To proof.
MS annotation by T. Wilson, Under Secretary, for the Chief Secretary, on 18 June 1883: 'To the Commissioners of Audit to withdraw the original and return the copy'. The Audit Office replied on 21 June: 'Original withdrawn and filed.' SCHEDULE of TRANSFERS submitted by the CHIEF SECRETARY to the GOVERNOR IN COUNCIL
